data.comment: The match has started.
Real Betis drive forward but Borja Iglesias is judged offside.
In the minute 2, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the away team a throw-in.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Real Betis's area.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joaquin (Real Betis) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 7, Nabil Fekir for the away team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Real Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Real Betis.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Betis's half?
Real Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Betis's half?
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis.
Free kick for Real Betis in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Alaves are whistled for offside.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Alaves.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Alaves throw-in in Real Betis's half.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Real Betis to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Free kick for Real Betis in the half of Alaves.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Alaves are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Real Betis to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Free kick Real Betis.
In the minute 22, Luis Rioja (Alaves) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Real Betis in the half of Alaves.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Real Betis.
In the minute 27, In Vitoria-Gasteiz Alaves attack through Ruben Duarte. The finish is off target, however.
Real Betis have a goal kick.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Real Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Alaves.
Can Real Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Guido Rodriguez (Real Betis) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Real Betis throw-in in Alaves's half.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 31, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fernando Pacheco.
Fernando Pacheco is back on the pitch.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Real Betis at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Betis's half?
In the minute 36, Free kick Alaves.
Free kick for Real Betis in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis in their own half.
In the minute 37, In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Real Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
In the minute 39, Alaves drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the home team a throw-in.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 42, Real Betis to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Real Betis's Nabil Fekir gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 43, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves advance rapidly upfield but Pablo Gonzales Fuertes blows for offside.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 45, Real Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Real Betis.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Alaves.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Sergio Canales of Real Betis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Real Betis have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 45, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 49, Rodrigo Battaglia (Alaves) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Real Betis defenders.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Alaves's Victor Laguardia gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis in their own half.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis.
Free kick for Real Betis in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 55, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Real Betis throw-in in Alaves's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Betis in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Real Betis have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 56, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Throw-in Alaves.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in high up the field for Real Betis in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis.
Sergio Canales hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Real Betis.
In the minute 61, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, Real Betis's Emerson has been booked in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Goal kick for Real Betis at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Lucas Perez of Alaves is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 65, Alaves make their first substitution with Javi Lopez replacing Lucas Perez.
Deyverson is replacing Luis Rioja for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Real Betis are caught offside.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Real Betis in their own half.
Free kick for Real Betis in the half of Alaves.
Manuel Pellegrini is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Mendizorroza with Aitor Ruibal replacing Joaquin.
In the minute 68, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Free kick for Real Betis in their own half.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 69, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis in their own half.
At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Javi Lopez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 71, Alex Moreno of Real Betis gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Free kick Alaves.
Alex Moreno (Real Betis) has received a yellow card from Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 72, Rodrigo Battaglia (Alaves) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Joselu (Alaves) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 74, Victor Laguardia's header is off-target for Alaves.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Real Betis a goal kick.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Betis's half?
Aitor Ruibal gets his shot on target but fails to score for Real Betis.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis in their own half.
In the minute 77, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes waits before resuming play because Claudio Bravo for Real Betis is still down.
Real Betis's Claudio Bravo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Real Betis territory.
In the minute 81, Real Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tomas Pina (Alaves) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Borja Iglesias for Real Betis has been booked by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Cristian Tello is replacing William Carvalho for the away team.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Free kick for Real Betis in their own half.
In the minute 86, Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Real Betis throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 88, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Betis.
Can Real Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a third substitution, with Martin Aguirregabiria replacing Edgar Mendez.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Real Betis in the half of Alaves.
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Betis's half?
Alaves are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the home team a throw-in.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Real Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Alaves are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Real Betis.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Real Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Real Betis have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Alaves throw-in in Real Betis's half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
The away team have replaced Nabil Fekir with Diego Lainez. This is the third substitution made today by Manuel Pellegrini.
Real Betis take a 0-1 lead thanks to Cristian Tello.
Sergio Canales instrumental with a fine assist.
Sergi Garcia Perez is on a sub for Pere Pons for Alaves.
